file_content.text: Was just remembering that Jedi I crushed. Still sends a charge through me.
The blood stains on my gear are crusty. Need to freshen them up.
What is on your mind, apprentice?
So much. I've only touched the dark side and already I feel as though the galaxy is unfurling before me.
There's so much to take in. And I'll admit-- I'm a little uncertain about what it means to be Sith.
You must learn how things run around here, and how best to serve me.
Let us begin your training.
Tell me, what do you think your role as my apprentice is about? What do you suppose our relationship is?
You are my master in all things. I do as you say no matter what. My life belongs to you.
Do not forget that. If I command it, you perform it. You will always be at the mercy of my whims.
Exactly.
Your whims are my desires.
As you prove yourself, you will be given greater latitude, provided my will is ultimately served.
The shackles will come off.
I spit on the Jedi way. The further I went with Nomen Karr, the more restricted I felt.
That's how I was trained, but I want to do things differently. Show respect and honor my commands, but you can you look me in the eye.
No. I reject that model.
Oh, I only wish you'd found me sooner!
Your transition to the dark side won't be easy. You should feel free to come to me with any concern.
I'm here for you.
I'm already more comfortable with you, with the dark side, than anywhere else I've been.
I will lead by example. Just do what I say and you will learn all that it means to be Sith.
It's simple--obey me.
I am in your hands, and I will watch with great hunger. Happily.
All my life, I've felt kept and confined. Always having to watch what I say, treating emotion as the enemy.
The dark side is my freedom. I'm going to express everything!
We believe that letting our emotions flow, makes us stronger and unlocks our potential.
That is the Sith way.
As you speak, I'm swelling with pride and hope.
Be sure your impulses align with my needs and you'll find that the filters and chains that have bound you will be removed.
As long as they serve me.
Consider me properly motivated, master.
Please, may I ask you something?
What do you want to know?
Granted.
Make it fast. My time is valuable, apprentice.
Quickly.
You need not be cautious with me, Jaesa.
You don't need permission.
Your availability is a gift.
Is there anything you wish to express now?
You may start.
Maybe one thing in particular...
You are a mere child in the ways of the dark side, there is so much for you to learn, and you ask me for permission to date?
Stop being an idiot.
My apologies, master.
It's important for you to experience a full range of sensations and emotion. So not only is that acceptable, it is required.
Feel free.
You will find that your obligations to me and my missions will leave little room for gallivanting.
Down time is limited.
It's about the Twi'lek, Vette. Can she be trusted? She seems rather soft.
It takes no special powers to see that.
Very perceptive.
Oh. Then you are already aware of her leanings.
Get this straight--treat her badly and you'll answer to me.
Leave her be.
I was only trying to help.
I have no issues with Vette and neither should you.
She is fine.
I'm sure you have it under control then. I meant no disrespect.
Vette lacks the will and the ability to resist. She complains but does as she's told.
She is not a threat.
If you're comfortable with her, then I am as well.
I see I have much to absorb. I'm humbled by your attention. Thank you.
We can continue this discussion another time.
Of course, my master.
Husband, will it ever stop--the craving for greater power; the lust for more conquest?
Master, will it ever stop--the craving for greater power; the lust for more conquest?
To Sith, those things are like breathing.
Never.
Everything ends eventually, Jaesa.
When you're dead.
I imagine it's possible we will mellow. Someday.
With age, perhaps.
The way I feel, the drive you've awakened and sustained in me will never extinguish. My last breath will be expelled fiercely.
Our children will be so gifted. And I'll use my special powers to help guide them and your future disciples.
I understand my powers so much better now, and I'll be able to bestow great advantages on your future offspring and disciples.
Together we will build the most fearsome legacy the galaxy has ever seen!
I look around, I see other men, even the uncomplicated, strong ones--you know, my type--and there's no reaction.
It's like every cell inside me knows--you and I are made for each other.
So you better propose or something, because our offspring will be the most powerful creatures in the galaxy.
Marriage first. We'll talk about the rest later.
Yes, but one thing at a time.
That sounds like a proposal to me.
Did you see that? My nostrils just flared and my pupils dilated.
Maybe you've forgotten who you're talking to. I'm the one who calls the shots.
I don't take orders.
Can't we leave the power plays behind us?
You're just brimming with confidence, aren't you? How do you know I want the same things?
You're so sure of yourself.
If you're asking if I used my power on you, don't insult me. I'm venturing out on my own. Blind.
Why don't you shut up and let me lead.
Okay, but I get to propose.
I can do that.
Marry me.
You're right--much better this way. My nostrils flared and my pupils dilated.
I love my emotions. I love being Sith!
I hate to burst your bubble, but marriage is not in our future.
Our romance ends here.
Really? Huh, didn't see that coming. Aren't I the fool?
I'm not going to crumble if that's what you're hoping. I'll be a big girl about this.
I'll kill a few innocents. Lose myself in some frivolous conquests. I'll be fine, you'll see.
You will be my wife, but not my equal. I will always be your master.
Marry and serve me.
You have them on the run, Jaesa. Don't let them rest.
Keep up the good work.
You should take a break. Let them think they can relax.
Best to ease off a little.
I really don't want to hear about your exploits, Jaesa. Just do your job and don't bother me about it.
Keep these things to yourself.
You read my mind.
Absolutely.
I'm just not feeling it.
I do not.
You made me wait, now it's your turn. Go to my quarters. I'll join you when I'm good and ready.
I dictate, not you.
Go. Now, before I change my mind.
Your hold on me has evaporated. You're nothing to me anymore.
I'm no longer interested.
Try to lighten up. After all, this is supposed to be fun, right?
I was just kidding.
You almost blew it. If you made me wait any longer, I would have looked elsewhere for my pleasure.
It's about time.
Follow me to my quarters.
If I order you to kill someone quickly, you'd better comply.
You will do whatever I say.
I'm glad you've found what fulfills you.
Whatever makes you happy.
Anything can become routine, Jaesa. You should allow for a variety of approaches.
Don't get carried away.
You're the first person I have no compulsion to use my power on in order to be sure I understand.
When I'm with you, I actually forget that I have this power. And it is such relief. I'm realizing I've never really relaxed before.
I need your critical edge, Jaesa. Your power must still serve me.
Don't get soft on me.
Of course. I will not fail you. I will be just as tenacious and suspicious and ruthless as ever. You can count on that.
It pleases me to relieve you of that burden.
I'm glad.
All my stresses subside when we're together.
You relax me, too.
Alright, this is almost too sweet. We don't want the galaxy thinking we've gone soft, do we?
Let's get back to work.
This is your calling, Jaesa. Go have fun.
By all means.
Let the Dark Council handle this one. I have need of you here.
We're too busy.
I just don't feel like letting you go.
I'm in the mood to say no.
I love you, too, Jaesa.
I feel the same.
Mmm. I feel weak and strong all at once. The chaos of it electrifies me.
My heart is yours now. Know that. But I want this to be different. Special.
Love and lust are easily confused, Jaesa. Forgive me if I'm reluctant.
Think on this further.
Take your time--my love will not waver. But know this...
If--I hope when--you do come to me, I will show you how deep my feelings run.
Actions speak louder than words, Jaesa.
Show me.
It's an insult to me to share you with another. You must end what you have with the Twi'lek.
I agree.
Love--it's just a word. Why must it presume permanence or fidelity? I won't stop seeing Vette.
I refuse.
But I'm not going to beg, if that's what you're after. Break it off with Vette or we will never be together again.
Are you threatening to break up with me?
Or what?
It's no threat. This is different for me. This is more than lust. I can't be left dangling, I'll go insane.
I need to know you're mine completely. Or I can't be with you. Please, end it with Vette. I won't ask again.
How dare you make ultimatums to me? I will not have it.
I'm ending it with you.
And I will not have a man who fraternizes so clearly beneath himself!
All right, then.
Consider it done.
My relationship with Vette is over, and we can see where this takes us.
We will be an unbeatable match, you and me.
I don't want to hurt you, but I won't leave Vette.
I'm sorry but no.
You are rejecting me for that-- that-- Ugh! I fail to see the appeal, but fine!
I'll still serve you loyally in all matters, but we are through!
I hope you and Vette have a miserable future!
All the better to wait until we ache with longing.
Perfect.
You take a chance that I may seeking satisfaction elsewhere.
Risky.
I've never heard anything so ridiculous. Your feelings must not be serious.
This is stupid.
I want to exalt in this. I want to find the planet with the most moons and howl at them all!
May I have some time away to find someone suitable to celebrate with?
By all means, cut loose.
You've earned it.
I'm more of a bruiser than a cutter.
Don't wait up.
There's no room in my operation for frivolity.
No.
It's quintessentially Sith to celebrate conquest. What good is victory without exaltation?
Somebody needs to loosen up.
Watch yourself and try to keep a low profile.
Just be careful.
And here I thought celebrating was supposed to be fun.
I'll try not to cause too much damage.
I see you've returned from meeting Lord Cendence. How was it?
Am I being outed as a traitor, then? Sent off to my death?
So, are you here to kill me?
Tell me you laughed in his face.
I hope you turned him down.
A very opportunistic man. Were it not directed at me, I would approve.
Clever.
I applaud you, Jaesa. Relish this moment.
Bravo.
Tell me about the fight.
I want details.
Don't let your sadism diminish the thrill of this, Jaesa.
You'll get over it.
Remind me never to anger you.
You're ruthless.
Does this mean your compulsion to purify the Sith has come to end?
So, are you done?
A true Sith should turn on her master. You were blinded by sentiment and missed a golden opportunity.
You should have betrayed me.
Your dream come true, and a deserved distinction, Jaesa.
You've earned it.
Keep your pride in check, apprentice. I will knock you down a peg or two if your ego gets too inflated.
Don't get a big head.
I don't relish the idea of my apprentice performing as a glorified dog catcher.
Not sure if I approve.
I have to give it to you before it can be taken away. Inform me when your contact has a target for you--maybe I'll feel magnanimous.
You never had it.
I will allow it, but I expect you to go out of your way to show your appreciation to me.
Fine. You owe me.
It's obvious how important this is to you. You may accept. But be sure you excel.
Okay, I sense your passion.
Your abilities would be very helpful to his task.
Someone you should meet.
Why should this Cendence have such authority?
What qualifies him?
Before you start glorifying this man, find out if his reputation is justified.
Don't get carried away.
That's good news, Jaesa. I'm sure he will see the sense of employing you to help carry out his work.
Congratulations.
Keep your wits, Jaesa. Power can corrupt, and this man has been handed great authority.
Be mindful.
Don't get any ideas of joining this Sith--you are my apprentice and belong to me.
You serve me.
The other night, I couldn't sleep. I sensed something and ventured out, tracking the sensation.
Tell me you ended his miserable existence.
I hope you destroyed him.
Are you murdering people in your sleep now, Jaesa?
Maybe you did it.
If for no other reason than to get information, you should have resuscitated the man.
I hope you saved him.
We could coordinate efforts with this Sith.
Indeed.
This is your little hobby, Jaesa. Pursue it as you see fit, but don't involve me.
Don't speak for me.
Is that all you were able to discover?
Anything else?
You have my blessing. Leave no stone unturned.
Get to it.
This is an extracurricular endeavor, apprentice. It must be handled on your own time, not mine.
Only in your free time.
Whatever makes you happy, Jaesa.
Knock yourself out.
It's so amusing to think I was once training to be a Jedi.
You're opening me up to my true potential.
I feel such power surging through me.
I'm impressed with how well you're absorbing all my various influences.
You're a quick learner.
Ready for more whenever you are. Dear.
There will be no stopping us.
It's no small task keeping up with me. I won't hesitate to drop you if you fall too far behind.
You'd better keep improving.
How romantic. You know that kind of talk only makes me more focused.
Hmm, I like how you challenge me. You'll see I'm up for it.
I'm so hungry for more.
You don't have to ring your own bell, Jaesa. Trust my powers of observation.
Don't gloat.
Deal. I like knowing your eyes are on me.
I trust you, master. Sorry if I tend to crow a bit too loudly.
Still, don't go out of your way to acknowledge my improvements or anything. I hate being fawned over, you know.
I like a woman who's direct. Follow me.
[Flirt] Sounds good.
Do you really want to do this?
Are you sure?
Ever since I joined you.
Everything looks a little different when you're relaxed, you know? The sky is brighter, the stars... shinier.
Still, I'm not blind. I know you have a thing going with the Twi'lek.
I think you're going to have to end that. You ought to tell her you're through with her, don't you think?
Never thought you'd be afraid of a little competition.
Not willing to fight for me?
I welcome the challenger. Just testing to see if I could push your buttons.
It's over between me and Vette.
Of course, Jaesa.
I guess I was convincingly serious. So glad I can push your buttons.
Can't wait to have you all to myself.
I will do whatever I want, with whomever I want, whenever I want. Is that clear?
You have no say.
Perfectly.
I really don't see what you see in her, but it's your life. And reputation.
Can't wait to get all tense again.
Your workload around here just doubled. You'll be tense before you know it.
I'll work you harder, then.
You can come to me whenever you're stressed.
Relax with me anytime.
In the future you may have to unstress yourself.
Don't get ahead of yourself.
Maybe another time. I'm not in the mood.
Not now.
Sure, why celebrate when we have something to celebrate. I'm sure there will be a much more opportune time later.
It's simple, Jaesa. Don't be discriminating.You have a taste for it now--sink your teeth as often as, and into whomever, you like.
Kill more.
Submerge yourself in the angst and desperation of wanting more.
Live with this feeling.
Get in touch with starvation. It will make you all the more lethal when the next opportunity presents itself.
You sound like a spice addict. You should control the violence, it should not control you.
Get over it.
There is still much in the galaxy you are not ready to face.
When you're ready.
If you abandon all caution before you're ready, you will burn out fast. Neither of us wants that.
Liken me to a Jedi again and you will lose everything.
Are you insulting me?
Maybe you're ready to be unleashed. If you die young, you die young.
Fine.
Let it feed you. There are few greater experiences than destroying traitors.
Wonderful.
A frightened man will confess to almost anything.
Confessions aren't dependable.
I will not put up with any more challenges from you.
Or what?
You do not dictate terms. Try it again and I'll make you confess to being a traitor.
I don't mean to dampen your pleasure, apprentice. Let your euphoria flow.
By all means.
Remember, the higher the high, the lower the low.
Remain tempered.
You're pretty scary, you know that?
Frightening.
You have something to tell me?
Sever a few limbs for me, will you?
Enjoy yourself.
Make quick work of them and return from your folly.
If you must.
What's stopping you from just pointing a finger at any Sith you don't like?
Can I trust your accusations?
How dare you suggest I'd abuse my power!
This is a mandate. These traitors to the dark side drip with disguised calm and secret mercy. It makes me sick. I can't fake that.
Master. I know I've been moody lately. Preoccupied about the false Sith I seek.
I want you to know, my confidence in the Empire is shaky, but my commitment to the dark side is strong.
I'm reveling in the power of my new emotions.
And you're flourishing. I'm very excited by the results.
It shows. Impressive.
Trust my ability to sense and recognize such things, Jaesa--you don't have to tell me.
Keep it to yourself.
I'm all ears. Tell me about these new emotions.
Express your feelings.
You name it, I feel it. Hatred, elation, fury. Lust.
I haven't properly thanked you for this amazing gift. I don't want you to think I take you for granted.
You should know that I can be, well, anything you wish me to be.
This will help me decide what I wish you to be.
Let's see. [Kiss Jaesa]
I'm going to need you to be a little more explicit.
[Flirt] Please explain.
Mmm. I like that side of you. I look forward to getting to know you better.
We've only scratched the surface.
This was just the beginning.
If the Jedi only knew what they were missing.
Don't think this endears you to me. You are still my thrall.
This changes nothing.
If you were anyone else I'd be insulted.
Mind yourself and do as you're told, and you just might.
Maybe you will.
I'll hold onto that promise, my master.
You are what I wish you to be. Nothing more.
My needs are met.
Oh. I see. You know what's best, master. But do let me know if you change your mind.
Anything that stirs such venom and passion is a gift. It feeds your power and makes you strong.
Revel in your hate
Your energy is wasted on this wish. Alderaan is not significant enough to devote such attention or passion.
Get over it
Maybe we'll get around to it after my missions are complete.
I'll put it on my to-do list.
Master, I'm plagued.
Make it fast, apprentice, I'm very busy.
Be brief.
This is important, master.
You of all people should know not to keep things suppressed, Jaesa.
Don't let something fester.
My mistake, master. I won't make it again.
Tell me what's on your mind.
I'm here for you.
What's on my mind. Let me see, how should I put it? Disenchantment? No, not strong enough. I'm feeling rather betrayed.
It's becoming clear that the dark side is as flawed and undependable as everything else.
Using my power to reach out into the galaxy, I'm becoming aware of false Sith--lords who are secretly leaning toward the light!
Supply me with names and we will deal with it.
Tell me who.
If I knew, I would have already torn out their eyes myself.
That's a very serious accusation, Jaesa.
Are you sure?
Do you think you have to tell me that? If I sense doubt in you, I'm going to lose it!
Know your place. I will not hesitate to strike you down! Am I understood?
Be silent!
Remain calm, Jaesa. I'm taking this seriously.
No need to get ruffled.
Oh. Good. Sorry to get so worked up.
Your emotions are so raw--it's thrilling to witness.
I love your passion.
Well, happy to entertain you, master.
This is what's bothering you? Why is that our concern?
That's all?
Why? Because it's impure. I thought I'd found something incorruptible.
If the Sith are as transitory and inconsistent as the Jedi, then we are doomed. It's a weakness that cannot be tolerated.
These light-leaning Sith must be rooted out and dealt with.
I agree.
It will take time for me to pinpoint who and where they are. But believe me, I will find them.
I'm glad this concerns you as much as it does me.
It doesn't matter to me. Look into it if you like.
Do whatever you must.
Yes, my master. I'll come to you again when I have hard facts.
I only hope that you rise to the occasion when I do.
If you're so concerned, stop whining and take action.
Then do something about it.
Oh, I will. Don't you doubt it.
I will not sleep until I have identified and located these traitors to the dark.
Sorry to have disturbed you.
Thank you for granting me this audience, master. I'll only take a moment.
I have nightmares. I'm wearing the plain robe of the Jedi. When I wake up I giggle like a small girl.
I hope you're not wasting my time.
What is the point?
N-No, master, sorry. There's just something I wish you to know...
I'd like to see that.
[Flirt] Delightful.
In your presence that giggle would be a full-bodied laugh.
That's a nice way to start the day.
How pleasant.
And I have you to thank for that.
You have me to thank for that reality.
You're welcome.
Exactly my point, master.
It is expected that an apprentice will eventually seek to overthrow her master. You'll never have to worry about that.
Do you think me a fool to be so easily manipulated?
I should kill you right now.
No. No, my master. I-I mean it. I swear.
You still display a child's naivete. I won't hold you to that.
Make no promises.
I have much to learn, but I know my heart.
My conviction is real. I can't imagine the galaxy without you leading me through it.
Don't you worry, I'm not going anywhere. You're dismissed.
You won't have to.
The conversation is over.
I'm done with this.
Sorry to have angered you.
I appreciate it, Jaesa. I really do. You may go.
I believe you.
Yes, my master. Thank you for this time.
I'm glad to hear it.
That's good news.
That's all. Thank you for this time, master.
I see you're enjoying yourself.
Sounds like fun.
Don't get confused, Jaesa--being Sith is not about rampant hedonism.
I do not approve.
I suggest you focus on finding some, then.
So get serious.
Relationships can be inhibiting, apprentice. Frivolity often nurtures freedom.
Don't be so sure.
I reserve my interest for much more accomplished men.
You're staring at one right now.
[Flirt] Like me.
Always set your sights high.
I should hope so.
The truth is, it's your attention I crave, master.
Be sure you can handle what you strive for.
[Flirt] Careful, apprentice...
I--I will, master. I mean, I'm sure.
Please excuse my clumsy attempt.
You're barking up the wrong tree. I don't dabble with underlings.
Not interested.
That's more like it--you're much more attractive when you don't beat around the bush.
[Flirt] I like boldness.
Now look, you've gone and made me blush.
You should probably hunt in your own playing field.
Grunts are your speed.
I see. Well, I was actually trying to get your attention, but I'm sure I was fooling myself. I won't bother you like that any more.
Giving up so easily, apprentice? Perhaps you're not as strong as I thought.
[Flirt] I'm disappointed.
No-- I mean, please don't judge me by my first attempt.
Be sure you don't.
Good.
I'll be ready for your next order.
It was obvious. Take notes, apprentice--for future purposes, I prefer a more direct approach.
[Flirt] I know.
I'll take that under advisement, master.
You'll see, I'm a quick learner. I won't be so clumsy next time. Until then.
Master, your indulgence, please. We haven't spoken for some time. Are you upset with me?
I don't have a lot of time to talk, Jaesa.
I'm busy.
Perhaps you're trying to test me. Stir up my emotions.
It hasn't been intentional.
Just an oversight.
Good to know.
I'm not hard to find. If you want to talk, speak up. Tell me anything.
You can come to me.
Can I tell you it angers me to be ignored?
The nobles on Alderaan treated me like I wasn't there. First because I was just a servant, then because they knew I could see through their pomp and distortions.
I wanted to expose it all, bring their political nonsense to a halt.
Who cares about the petty concerns of diplomats?
Why bother?
When it's your entire world, you can get wrapped up in it.
It became a compulsion to keep track of it all.
The system thrives, even relies, on manipulation and bluffing.
Politics is lying.
I was an idealist.
I thought if you nixed the lying and the cheating, so much more could get done.
What was stopping you?
Why didn't you?
I was naive. Stupid. And the lady I served seemed sincere when she advised me not to.
Of course she ended up using me for her own ambitions.
Deep down I hated my life. But I swallowed those feelings.
No wonder Nomen Karr came calling for you. The Jedi turn suppression into an art form.
That's the Jedi way.
It's pathetic. You saved me from a truly terrible existence. I'll never stop thanking you.
You've come a long way already--now, you can let your feelings go.
Those days are over.
Yes. I'm finally living. All thanks to you.
Then you got what you deserved.
Just desserts.
Well, I'm making up for lost time now. Thanks to you.
Master, when we return to the ship. I'd appreciate some time to talk.
Master, when it is convenient, I'd like to speak with you.
Please master, let's talk later.
The Jedi kept me stifled--romantic interactions were strictly forbidden. I'm near starved. When time allows, am I free to go hunting?
This just keeps getting better and better. I'm beside myself.
I understand, yes. I'll take small bites, and only as time permits.
Oh, can't we leave the game playing behind us?
I want us to be married, and then populate the galaxy with Sith. But only as equals.
I see. I suppose I'll have to learn to be satisfied with that.
As master and husband, you are my superior.
Master, I've learned there's a bounty on my head. Isn't that wonderful?
Apparently, some shaky Sith are growing concerned about my efforts to purify our ranks.
It seems an act of desperation, don't you think? A mark that I'm doing an excellent job hunting down the traitors.
Oh, I won't. You can be sure of that.
This only adds fuel to my fire. I won't stop until every last soft and weak-willed Sith is eradicated.
My work is so... gratifying. I just love being me.
Talk about bursting my bubble. I don't like the idea of appearing weak, but if you say so.
I'll lure them into a false sense of security and then strike when they poke their noses out of their holes.
Fun, fun, fun, fun, fun.
Sometimes you can be a real stick in the mud, you know that?
I'll start sharing my adventures with the Twi'lek, then. Might be fun to see if I can make her lose her lunch.
I have to say, this idea to wait and let the desire churn... fantastic.
I'm burning for you like never before. I think it's time to do something about it, don't you?
You're joking, right? I can't be alone in this.
If you're cross with me for making us wait, get over it. Don't cut off your nose to spite your face.
Now, are you going to take me to your quarters, or what?
I'm sorry if I annoyed you. It will not happen again.
Yes, my master.
You are one cruel man. I admire that even as the sting of this makes me scream.
I'll do your bidding and back you up in battle, but consider my heart and body off limits. Forever.
You scoundrel, you. You shouldn't play around with a woman's heart. Especially one with a violent streak.
Lead the way so I can keep my eyes on you.
I like it when you lead--I'll be watching you the whole way there.
Have to admit, that was so worth the wait.
Instant gratification is overrated. I'm a new woman now. So much greater intensity is built through denying one's appetites and then gorging.
I'm going to apply this lesson to all things. Eating, training, killing. I won't take the easy, quick path ever again.
Of course. Whatever you dictate, however you want. I trust you utterly.
You fulfill me. And I trust you, completely.
I'm game for whatever approaches you can dream up. I trust you completely.
Master, I've found a Sith whose commitment to the dark side is waning.
I alerted Emissary Caliqu. He was very pleased, and now wants to know if I am available to handle the matter.
You are the most wickedly wonderful master I could possible wish for.
I'll be back before you know I've gone.
I trust our work will be just as barbaric and stimulating.
Well, thanks for nothing, then.
Perhaps you'll allow me to take care of the next traitor I come across.
Master, everything else aside, the visceral experience of facing Lord Cendence continues to tantalize me. I relive it nightly and awaken buzzing.
When I feel such pleasure, all I can think of is sharing it with you. When I feel pain, I ache to be consoled by you.
I know what this is--it's love.
I understand if you're hesitant to trust my feelings. I'm young, and I've been casual with my affections.
Believe me, I ache to show you how deep my love runs. But I want this to be different. Special.
What? But why? She's nothing compared to me. You must be toying with me.
As you already know, my reflex is to rush to instant gratification. But let's milk this feeling. This want. Let it build before we act on it.
The ache in me spikes when you talk like that.
I think we're going to like this little experiment.
If you can't wait a little for me, your feelings must not be real.
Don't doubt my sincerity. I must follow my instincts here--I will not weaken my stance.
I hope you indulge my little experiment. I promise it will be worth your while.
Interesting, to say the least. Within moments, I realized he was killing any Sith he pleased, all in the name of hunting traitors.
Very few of his victims were valid targets. And he was very excited that my special power would unequivocally validate his work.
Said that we could literally reorganize the entire power structure of the Empire. To entice me, he suggested we start by pointing the finger at you.
You are kidding, of course. If not, I don't think I've ever been so insulted.
I laughed in it, then I stuck my light saber through it.
Well, his opportunities have dried up a bit.
The man wanted me to abuse my gifts. And betray the one person in the galaxy I respect and owe my life to.
It took everything I had, but it was the most satisfying kill of my young life.
Oh, I do, master. But there's even more.
He was ferocious. Honestly, there was a point where I thought I was done for. But my power is beginning to help me innately.
I intuited a feint, and, ignoring it, was able to counter his death blow and seize an opening--a fatal thrust through the neck.
I've decided I don't like lightsabers--they cauterize as they cut. I would have enjoyed the blood.
Oh, believe me, I'm not. I haven't even told you the best part.
You elicit other emotions, dear. Besides, if you make me mad, I have a new way to vent.
I'll have a new way to take out my anger, master.
Ah, of course not, master. I've saved the best part for last.
Serving you serves me just fine. Besides, I saw the means to another end.
The Dark Council's emissary--a man named Caliqu--was there too. He's the one holding Lord Cendence's leash on this assignment.
He offered me Cendence's mandate. As I sense light-leaning Sith, I'd report them to him. And when possible, I'd be sent to eradicate.
I would expect nothing less.
No, master, this is the perfect use of my power!
This mandate was being disregarded, and now it can be served faithfully. Please, don't take it from me!
Fine. I'll live by your whims.
Even if you forbid it, I will survive this disappointment. And I'll be ready when you need me next.
With pleasure, master. Your reconsideration is an honor.
I will make you proud, I promise.
And don't think I'll forget that it's you who has made this possible. My devotion will never flutter. Thank you.
Master, I have exciting news! A trail of corpses--all slain the same as the light side Sith I found--has led me to the perpetrator.
His name is Lord Cendence. He's been secretly hand-chosen by the Dark Council to eradicate any and all Sith who are not pure.
He operates with immunity. No one is above his judgment. It makes my mouth water just thinking about such power.
That's what I was thinking.
From what I've learned, he is an uncommon butcher. Driven by darkness.
I've looked into his exploits--he has left a nearly unrivaled body count in his wake.
He's already accused and destroyed so many traitors. It's a mystery to me how he has been so prolific without my special power.
But I have reached out to him and he has granted me an audience.
I love that you're not jealous. Through him I'll quench my need to purify the Sith, and be back in my quarters every night. Or in yours.
It does seem a perfect fit.
You're always so suspicious. Don't forget, my abilities make me an excellent judge of character.
If you're jealous, don't be. I'll be back in my quarters every night. Or in yours.
I'll aid Lord Cendence's hunts on my own time. Consider it a fanciful hobby that will keep me happy and fresh for your campaigns.
This is my destiny--the purpose of my power. I know it. Now, I'm meeting him shortly. Leave a light on for me.
Master, I've become aware of an amazing development.
I came upon a badly injured Sith who reeked of the light side. He was suffering and on the verge of death.
I didn't have to. His injuries were extreme.
Even I couldn't have done this--asleep or awake.
Would have been impossible. His injuries were way too severe.
He spoke of a Sith and his agents whose sole purpose is to hunt down traitors to the dark side.
Whoever this Sith is, he filled this man with such fear and pain. All I can think is "Where do we sign up?"
Exactly my thinking. We can share information and pool resources, and clean up the Empire all the more thoroughly.
Fine. I thought you might be interested, but I can handle this on my own.
Unfortunately, the whimpering mound of meat expired before I could learn too much more.
By using my power on the dying man, I got an impression of the Sith who did the damage.
I'm reaching out with my senses to try to catch his scent. Some kind of trail I can follow to locate him!
I will be thorough, master.
That goes without saying. At least, I wish it did.
I was hoping it would make you happy. No matter, I'm sure you'll perk up when I find him.
Master, as time passes, the thrill of killing the light side Sith is ebbing.
I'm in search of a new thrill. Perhaps one slightly more... personal in nature.
Master, I want you. Why don't we find someplace quiet?
I can handle it. The more pain, the more pleasure. Makes sense to me.
In our line of work, that won't be long.
Oh no--I'll be patient. I'll store it up until you come calling.
Until next time. Master.
I'm hungry for new thrills. I'm actually shaking from the craving for more. I come to you for suggestions.
It warms me that you understand this appetite. And that you trust me to discover my own boundaries.
Not what I was looking for, but all right.
You're preaching temperance? The Jedi trumpet control. I want to be unbound!
It seems you don't trust me to discover my own boundaries. So be it.
I'll bow to your greater experience, master.
Perhaps you're right--left unchecked I could blunder into trouble, as I just have with you.
Your word is final in all things. I will not make that mistake again, master.
I'm sure there are boundaries that should not be crossed, and I appreciate the trust to discover them myself.
You'll see I'm up to it. For instance, your crew will be off limits. I won't take out my desires or aggressions on them. Unless ordered to, of course.
Thank you, master.
The false Sith are dead. I slaughtered them. I slaughtered them all.
But not before getting confessions from each and making them beg. I've never felt such satisfaction.
I will be on the lookout for every one of those experiences.
For now, I'll continue to use my power to search for traitorous Sith. Then systematically eradicate them all.
Your doubt sours my mood. Let me enjoy this!
Yes, master. Euphoria of the kill made me lose myself. But I am moored in reality again.
I will be sure to exhaust all uncertainty before hunting any other Sith. I promise you.
Like blood from a gutted foe!
I will feel every moment to the utmost. High or low. Both will fuel me.
Thank you. Makes you proud, doesn't it?
I'm going to continue to use my power to search for traitorous Sith. Then systematically eradicate them all.
The Empire will be pure when I am through. I vow it.
I'm just informing you that I will be disembarking for a short while.
I've finally tracked down the false Sith I'm sensing. It's time for me to bathe in their impure blood.
You add fire to my rage, master.
Be limp about this, fine--it will not quell my enthusiasm.
I will return once my bloodlust has been quenched.
I simply feel I must do this, master. If you don't approve, punish me when I return.
That's exactly what I wanted to hear.
Understood, master. I hope you'll allow me a little latitude from time to time.
Maybe this will be explicit enough...
Something very raw has bubbled up from a long-locked place inside me. I need to vent it.
Simply put, I want my homeworld of Alderaan to burn. I daydream of crushing its people and laying waste to its castles.
You're right. I actually feel stronger when I think of Alderaan in ruin.
Couldn't you have just indulged my fantasy, even a little? Now you've ruined my little buzz. Thanks for nothing, killjoy.
I knew you'd understand.
I'll keep picturing it in my mind. If you see me smiling for no apparent reason, that's why.
I've come to realize my appreciation of you puts me at odds with a precept of the Sith way.
Master, remember the last Imperial port we were docked at? Because I don't. Think I partied a little too hard there.
I vaguely recall an Imperial soldier. I think he and I... got to know each other. Either that or I might have killed him. Or both maybe, it's fuzzy.
The way I see it, I work hard so I should play hard.
What's the point of sharing?
I just want you to know that I'm exploring all my impulses. Reveling in my freedoms. Like a good Sith.
Really? Why not? I work hard, why can't I play hard?
But don't get me wrong, I'm not really interested in nameless, faceless, possibly lifeless grunts.
I'm sure true sustenance will come from more substantive experiences.
Your advice goes a long way with me, master. My next furlough will be spent doing exactly that.
I'll keep that in mind, my lord.
This conversation is a waste.
I thought maybe we could hit the next port together, but I guess I was mistaken.
Pity. Would have been fun.
Yes, master.
There will be no stopping us.
You add fire to my rage, master.
As you decree, my lord.
I'll do what I can, master.
Consider me properly motivated, master.
Anything my master says.
Your whims are my desires.
Let's get back to work.
I will make you proud, I promise.
I'll be ready for your next order.
As you wish, master.
I hear you, master. I will follow your lead.
Whatever is to come, I am with you.
I feel such power surging through me.
